content: new -- updated for 2025 download the attached pdf original pattern written in 2010 is available through the original knitty publication 1 not as a downloadable pattern for a toddler version please see booby socks 6 for an adult version please see felted duck slippers 7 please note that since this is a free pattern pattern support is limited to the basics knitters are welcome to contact me with questions and if i can t give you a quick answer then i will direct you to other resources 1 http //www knitty com/issuess10/pattduck php 6 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/blue-footed-booby 7 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/felted-duck-slippers
